channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Gutenberg Blocks with AI by Kadence WP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Gutenberg Blocks with AI by Kadence WP

item.title: CVE-2024-6884|2024-08-08T18:27:36.888Z -- unknown -- gutenberg%20blocks%20with%20ai%20by%20kadence%20wp
item.description: The Gutenberg Blocks with AI by Kadence WP WordPress plugin before 3.2.39 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
